product.title: Celebrate Everything Notecard Set • Galison x Oxford Pennant Original
product.description: The Celebrate Everything Notecard Set from Galison contains a mashup of folded and flat card sizes featuring colorful art and a set of messages for different occasions. Included in this notecard set are the positive messages “You are Magnificent,” “Yes You Can,” “Better Together,” and more. - 6 Designs, 2 Each - Multiple Flat & Folded Card Sizes - Envelope with printed flap - Box Size: 5.375 x 8 x 1.125”, 136 x 203 x 28 mm - Designs by Oxford Pennant
product.descriptionHtml:
The Celebrate Everything Notecard Set from Galison contains a mashup of folded and flat card sizes featuring colorful art and a set of messages for different occasions.

Included in this notecard set are the positive messages “You are Magnificent,” “Yes You Can,” “Better Together,” and more.

- 6 Designs, 2 Each

- Multiple Flat & Folded Card Sizes

- Envelope with printed flap

- Box Size: 5.375 x 8 x 1.125”, 136 x 203 x 28 mm

- Designs by Oxford Pennant
